=== Members ===
This page contains the members of the KenyanTeam according to the provinces. For the sake of simplicity, we are yet to pair up as provinces because we are still a startup. If you wish to join, just add yourself to the table. You may also like to add yourself to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-ke/|Kenyan Team on Launchpad]]</nowiki>.
